lore.description: A longer, more thematic description of the spell that can be used in-game to add lore and flavor

talisman.description: The spell talisman which creates this spell

skill.description: The skill which powers this spell

castSlot.description: The slot the spell can fit in

oneOf.title: Cantrips are typically basic attacks that don't cost mana and are a player's primary means of dealing damage. They are typically the most spammable spell in a player's arsenal.
Slotted spells are the primary spells a player uses. They are typically more powerful than cantrips and have a variety of effects.
Ultimate spells are the most powerful spells a player can cast. They are typically on a long cooldown and have a variety of powerful effects.

castType.description: The type of cast the spell uses

oneOf.title: Channel spells must be maintained to be active.
Cast spells are cast over a period of time and can be interrupted. Only when the cast is complete does the spell take effect.

cooldown.description: The time it takes to cool down after casting the spell

castTime.description: The time it takes to cast the spell

range.description: The range of the spell, used to determine how far it can travel

speed.description: The speed of the spell, used to determine how quickly it travels

acceleration.description: The acceleration of the spell, used to determine how quickly it gets up to max speed.

duration.description: The duration of the spell, used to determine how long it lasts

baseDamage.description: The damage of the spell, used to determine how much damage it does

baseHealing.description: The healing of the spell, used to determine how much healing it does

buffs.description: The buffs applied by the spell

debuffs.description: The debuffs applied by the spell

radius.description: The radius of the spell, used to determine how large the area of effect is

angle.description: The angle of the spell, used to determine how wide the area of effect is

iconTileset.description: The tileset with the icon of the spell (path in the assets folder)

iconIndex.description: The index of the icon in the tileset

spriteTileset.description: The sprite of the spell (path in the assets folder)

spriteIndex.description: The index of the sprite in the tileset

particles.description: Particles to attach to the spell

particleId.description: The unique_id for the particle effect

attachment.description: The attachment point of the particle
